definition: disobedient/to violate the Mandate of Heaven (天命[Tian1 Ming4])
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: What have you learned from the event of Saul keeping those cows and sheep?
sentences.chinese: 你對掃羅違命留下牛羊事件有何看法？
